string.value: After completing the mission, you are transferred to the headquarters. Statistics on the progress of the mission will be displayed here.
After reading the statistics, you will be able to select a new mission at the headquarters. To open the headquarters menu, you must press the horn key (H by default).

After selecting a mission, you will be given a new vehicle and access to new weapons in the warehouse. Before starting the mission, make sure that all the necessary weapons are installed on the vessel.

The briefing text for the selected mission is automatically recorded in the log. Once the selection of a mission has been confirmed, it cannot be canceled.||That concludes the tutorial. The statistics of your first completed mission now will be displayed.
